note:
Java developer and former mathematician. Interests include craft beer, black cats, skepticism, classical guitar, mandolin, metal (particularly symphonic and NDH), sci-fi, languages, and open source (although I don't contribute nearly as much as I should :( ). There should be more hours in a day.

I don't really care which pronouns you use but he/him would be the typical choice.

You're welcome to follow me but unless we've met I'm unlikely to follow back.
